biography:
Takashi Tsukamoto (born October 27, 1982) is a Japanese actor, singer, and model.

He has released three single CDs: "Itsudemo Boku wa" (Anytime I am...), "Hitorigoto" (Soliloquy), "New Morning". He also portrayed the character Gion Toji in the videogame Ryū ga Gotoku Kenzan! in both voice and likeness that was captured using facial scanning technology.

name: Takashi Tsukamoto
